title: How many marks are required in the JEE Main to get BIT DURG? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey reader, You just need to qualify jee mains to get admission in BIT durg. For C.s branch Or else maintain a good rank in CGPET. In double figures. Or else score good marks in your boards  Like if you are getting 90 + percentage in your boards . You can easily be shortlisted for admission. Hope it helps

Well..I had got admission in BIT,Durg through CGPET rank . My rank was 723 all over. If you are not from CG domicile,then your Jee mains score should be atleast the cutoff of your category. For domicile other than chhattisgarh,there is JEE MAINS quota also for admission in CG colleges,You can apply for that.
For Branch other than Computer Science or IT you need to have marks above 80 but for other branches you may get it for above 45. From last years reference(2018).
